intro: Aspidistra xuansonensis, commonly known as the Xuanson's aspidistra, is a species of flowering plant native to China. The plant produces small, inconspicuous white flowers that bloom in clusters during the spring. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species in its natural habitat.
